name: Fruit Crush—box mania
description:
Game Description:As square lovers you, never miss an updated version of the game tetris!

Game Features:Add fresh fruit theme,let's elimination fruit together.
Rich fun sound effects,easy and fluency fingertips!
Simple finger small operate is reduced pressure tool!
Add new fun game, will let you fondle admiringly!

Playing Method:Put the three alternative block to the bottom of the screen on the board,fill a row or a column can be eliminate,eliminate the more,the higher the score,until the player will nowhere place block,the game ends.
